task.title: Integrating Monday with Outside Applications
task.shortdesc: Integrations can be made within the Boards to page to use other company collaborative products, such as Google Drive, Gmail, Slack, and more. This allows users to connect all potential files and messages in one place, and can be done very simply from the Monday Boards page.

step.cmd: From the board page, click the integration button on the top of the screen. (The icon within the button is shaped like an electrical plug).
You can search for the app in the search bar or look for the app in the app list.

fig.title: Select the App you Wish to Integrate.

step.cmd: Click the app you wish to integrate
Select which option you wish to integrate.
Monday will request you sign in or select a connected account.
Connect account to Monday and your integration will be active.
